Upgrade Courier.description: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base. Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

Go To Secret Shop.description: Sends the courier to your team's secret shop.

Speed Burst.description: The courier gains a burst of speed for 4 seconds.

Flying Courier.lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

additional_info.note: Becomes available for purchase at the 3 minute mark.
It takes 3 minutes for the Flying Courier to replenish in the stock.
Flying Courier is completely shareable .

This item acts as a recipe to upgrade the Animal Courier . Buying it automatically upgrades the Animal Courier (wherever it is) . However, unlike other recipes, it does not combine into one item when the Animal Courier and the Flying Courier items are in the inventory.
However, unlike other recipes, it does not combine into one item when the Animal Courier and the Flying Courier items are in the inventory.

Bash.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

Skull Basher.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

additional_info.note: When held by Slardar , Spirit Breaker , Troll Warlord or Faceless Void , Bash cannot proc.
One Skull Basher grants a total of 200 health , 0.6 health regeneration and 10 (20 to strength heroes) attack damage .

Platemail.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: While spell immune, Infused Raindrop does not react on magical damage.

Magical Damage Block.description: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

additional_info.note: Becomes available for purchase at the 3 minute mark.
After that, it has a 1 second restock time.

Infused Raindrops do not stack in the inventory. Each of them requires its own slot. Their regeneration does stack. They lose charges at the same time, although only one of them actually blocks damage.

Cloak.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

additional_info.note: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance .
Increases most heroes' total magic resistance to 36.25%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
Increases Meepo 's and Visage 's total magic resistance to 44.75% and 23.5% respectively, assuming their basic magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.

Devour.description: Consume a target tree to restore 115 health over 16 seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount. Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tango.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself in inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell-back price adapts based on the number of Tangoes in a stack.
A set of Tangoes is not shareable . However, it is possible to give allies a Tango (Shared) by casting it on them.

Avatar.description: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.

Black King Bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

additional_info.note: One Black King Bar grants a total of 200 health , 0.6 health regeneration and 24 (34 to strength heroes) attack damage .

Attack Range Bonus.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

notes.note: Attack range bonuses from multiple Dragon Lances or Hurricane Pikes do not stack.
Stacks with any other source of attack range bonus.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.
Does not affect the range of secondary attacks like Moon Glaive ​, Split Shot ​, Flak Cannon ​ or Marksmanship ​.
Affects the cast range of Focus Fire â€‹ as well, so it matches the total attack range.

Dragon Lance.lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

additional_info.note: One Dragon Lance grants a total of 240 health , 0.36 health regeneration , 2 armor and 14 attack speed (and 12 attack damage to Strength and 14 attack damage to Agility heroes).

True Sight.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

Gem of True Sight.lore: Not one thrall creature of the depths, Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep, Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular, Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

additional_info.note: Gem of True Sight is partially shareable .
The stock takes 10 minutes to replenish.
This item drops when its wielder dies, unless it has Reincarnation .
Gem of True Sight cannot be destroyed or sold.

Reaver.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

additional_info.note: One Reaver grants a total of 500 health and 1.5 health regeneration (and 25 attack damage to strength heroes).

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Illusions always have the broken version in their inventory.

Break.description: Whenever you attack or are attacked, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 65 for 13 seconds.

Tranquil Boots.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
The health regeneration of multiple Tranquil Boots fully stacks.

Chainmail.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

Ring of Regen.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

additional_info.note: Ring of Regen is partially shareable .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on spell immune allies.
 Can be procced by spell immune enemies, and attempts to damage them. Cannot hit secondary spell immune enemies.

modifiers.value: Item Mjollnir Static: Dispellable with any dispel.

Static Charge.description: Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and additional enemies.

notes.note: Double clicking the item casts it on self.
Successive casts on the same allied refresh the buff duration.
The radius is centered around the shielded unit.
Upon proccing, the proccing unit and 4 random enemy units within the radius are hit.
Static Charge cannot proc more than once per second.
Does not hit invisible units or units in the Fog of War .
Despite the description, Static Charge can proc on any damage, including from spells, not only on attacks.
Can only proc on damage instances of 5 or greater ( after reductions ).
Does not trigger on self-inflicted damage, and damage flagged as HP Removal .
All bolts together can deal up to 1000 damage ( before reductions ).
Static Charge uses pseudo-random distribution .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Can proc on and attempts to damage spell immune enemies. Cannot bounce to spell immune enemies.

Chain Lightning.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.

notes.note: Does not stack with the Chain Lightning of Maelstrom or other Mjollnirs.
When obtaining multiple items with the Chain Lightning ability, only the one that has been continuously the longest in the inventory works.
The lightning bounces in 0.25 second intervals, so hitting max targets takes 2.75 seconds.
Does not bounce on invisible units or units in the Fog of War .
Can never hit the same unit twice per proc.
Can only proc on successfully hit attacks, thus missed attacks cannot proc.
All bounces together can deal up to 1800 damage ( before reductions ).
Chain Lightning can proc while a previous chain lightning is still bouncing.
Chain Lightning uses pseudo-random distribution .
The Mjollnir Chain buff is a hidden buff required for the lightning to jump.
Chain Lightning does not use a regular cooldown. It is neither displayed on the item icon when proccing, nor is it affected by cooldown manipulating effects.

Mjollnir.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

additional_info.note: Mjollnir is very effective against heroes with illusions like Naga Siren , Spectre and particularly Phantom Lancer and Chaos Knight that can surround you because the lightning goes all around you compared to cleave.
This item is very good for pushing, you can apply the Static Charge on a creep to push a lane safely while you jungle and get extra gold.

special_details.PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Returned magical damage is reduced to 0.

Damage Return.description: For 4.5 seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.

Blade Mail.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

additional_info.note: One Blade Mail grants a total of 6 armor , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 22 (32 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Ultimate Upgrade.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.

Aghanim's Scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

additional_info.note: One Aghanim's Scepter grants a total of 375 health , 0.6 health regeneration , 1.43 armor , 10 attack speed , 285 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 10 attack damage .

The following heroes cannot drop or sell Aghanim's Scepter once they have purchased it, due to receiving a new ability, or in case of Meepo an additional Divided We Stand clone: Earth Spirit , Lifestealer , Meepo , Morphling , Nyx Assassin , Ogre Magi , Timbersaw , Treant Protector , Tusk , and Zeus .
Earth Spirit , Lifestealer , Meepo , Morphling , Nyx Assassin , Ogre Magi , Timbersaw , Treant Protector , Tusk , and Zeus .

Blades of Attack.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

Damage Block.description: Gives a 50% chance to block 16 damage on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

Stout Shield.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

additional_info.note: Axe's high natural health regeneration combined with Stout Shield makes him much tougher in lane, especially after picking up another health regeneration item.

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Can proc on spell immune enemies. Cannot slow spell immune enemies. Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

modifiers.value: Echo Sabre Debuff: Dispellable with any dispel.

Echo Strike.description: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.7 second 100% movement speed slow on each strike.

notes.note: This ability works exclusively for melee heroes.
Upon proccing, grants the user 490 attack speed until the next attack.

subnotes.note: This means it does not provide guaranteed full attack speed and can be countered by strong attack speed slows.
The attack speed has no set duration. It lasts until the user makes a second attack, no matter how long they wait.

notes.note: Since it is a simple attack speed bonus, it is possible to cancel the second attack and "store" the attack speed for later.
The second attack is not an instant attack. It uses regular attack animation times and attack cooldowns.
The movement speed slow is applied on the proccing attack and on the attack after the proccing attack.

subnotes.note: This means it is possible to slow two enemies with one proc, by switching attack targets after the proccing attack.

notes.note: The slow of multiple instances does not stack, but refreshes the duration instead.
Procs on anything, including buildings, wards and allies. The slow fully applies to allies, but not to buildings and wards.

Echo Sabre.lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

additional_info.note: One Echo Sabre grants a total of 200 health, 0.6 health regeneration, 10 attack speed, 110 mana, 0.4 (+75%) mana regeneration, 0.71% spell damage and 15 (25 to strength and intelligence heroes) attack damage.

Phase.description: Gives 24% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 20% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units for 2.5 seconds.

Phase Boots.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

Gauntlets of Strength.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

additional_info.note: One Gauntlets of Strength grants a total of 60 health and 0.18 health regeneration (and 3 attack damage to strength heroes).

Perseverance.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

additional_info.note: Perseverance is partially shareable .

Point Booster.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

Barrier.description: Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Insight Aura.description: Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

Pipe of Insight.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

additional_info.note: The magic resistance stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Increases most heroes' total magic resistance to 47.5%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance. Together with the aura, this is further increased to 52.75%.
Together with the aura, this is further increased to 52.75%.

Increases Meepo 's and Visage 's total magic resistance to 54.5% and 37% respectively, assuming their basic magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance. Together with the aura, this is further increased to 59.05% and 43.3%.
Together with the aura, this is further increased to 59.05% and 43.3%.
Pipe of Insight does not inherit the attribute bonuses from Headdress .
Together with the aura , one Pipe of Insight grants a total of 12 health regeneration to the owner.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_PARTIAL_USE: Illusions do not benefit from the attack damage and armor and do not lose health per second. Illusions gain the strength over 0.6 seconds and copy the original's current health, resulting in them having 500 current health more than the hero if it was not at full health as the illusion was created.

Unholy Strength.description: When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

Armlet of Mordiggian.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

additional_info.note: Attack damage, attack speed, armor and health regeneration bonuses of multiple Armlets of Mordiggian do not stack.

One Armlet of Mordiggian grants the following: While toggled off, grants a total of 7 health regeneration , 5 armor , 25 attack speed and 9 attack damage . While toggled on, grants a total of 500 health , 8.5 health regeneration, 9 armor, 25 attack speed and 40 (65 to strength heroes) attack damage.
While toggled off, grants a total of 7 health regeneration , 5 armor , 25 attack speed and 9 attack damage .
While toggled on, grants a total of 500 health , 8.5 health regeneration, 9 armor, 25 attack speed and 40 (65 to strength heroes) attack damage.

Reveal.description: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes by 20% in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.

Dust of Appearance.lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself in the inventory.
Dust of Appearance is completely shareable .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Applies damage on spell immune enemies. Does not apply debuff on spell immune enemies.

Shadow Walk.description: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage to the target, and for 5 seconds, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output by 50%.

Silver Edge.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

additional_info.note: One Silver Edge grants a total of 300 health , 0.9 health regeneration , 2.14 armor , 45 attack speed , 165 mana , 0.6 mana regeneration , 1.07% spell damage and 45 attack damage .

Vitality Booster.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

Headdress.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

additional_info.note: One Headdress grants a total of 40 health , 3.12 health regeneration , 0.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 0.08 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on self while spell immune.
 Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies.

Cyclone.description: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Eul's Scepter of Divinity.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Eul's Scepters of Divinity fully stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
One Eul's Scepter of Divinity grants a total of 40 movement speed , 110 mana , 0.4 (+ 150%) mana regeneration and 0.71% spell damage (and 10 attack damage to Intelligence heroes).

Spellblock.description: Blocks most targeted spells once every 13 seconds.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: The buff can be transfered to illusions, however it does not block a spell for them.

Transfer Spellblock.description: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 13 seconds.

Linken's Sphere.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

additional_info.note: One Linken's Sphere grants a total of 300 health , 6.9 health regeneration , 2.14 armor , 15 attack speed , 165 mana , 0.6 (+ 150%) mana regeneration , 1.07% spell damage and 30 attack damage .

Robe of the Magi.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

additional_info.note: One Robe of the Magi grants a total of 66 mana , 0.24 mana regeneration and 0.43% spell damage (and 6 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Oblivion Staff.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

additional_info.note: One Oblivion Staff grants a total of 10 attack speed , 110 mana , 0.4 (+ 75%) mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 10 (20 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Bracer.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

additional_info.note: One Bracer grants a total of 120 health , 0.36 health regeneration , 0.43 armor , 3 attack speed , 33 mana , 0.12 mana regeneration , 0.21% spell damage and 6 (9 to strength heroes) attack damage .

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Red critical numbers are before illusion and armor reduction.

Critical Strike.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 135% additional damage.

Daedalus.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

additional_info.note: In the original DotA, this item was called the " Buriza-Do Kyanon ", a reference to a weapon (unique ballista) in Diablo II . "Buriza-do Kyanon" means "Blizzard Cannon" in Japanese.

Daedalus is the Latin transcription of the Greek "Daidalos" which means "clever worker" in Ancient Greek and Daedalus is also one of the characters in Ovid's "Metamorphoses" who was a skillful craftsman and artisan.
Considering Crystalys gives 34.5 + 15% effective damage; if you have 41 or more damage Crystalys is better value for your gold than Demon Edge .

Ogre Club.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

additional_info.note: One Ogre Club grants a total of 200 health and 0.6 health regeneration (and 10 attack damage to strength heroes).

Claymore.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Disarm persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled. Can be dispelled by spell immunity only.

Disarm.description: Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

modifiers.value: Heavens Halberd Buff: Dispellable with any dispel.

Lesser Maim.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

notes.note: Successive procs on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The proc chances of Lesser Maim from multiple Heaven's Halberds work fully independently from each other.
Fully stacks with the Lesser Maim from Sange and the Greater Maim from Sange and Yasha , including the slow .
Does not work against wards and buildings . Works against allied units.
Lesser Maim uses pseudo-random distribution .

Heaven's Halberd.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

additional_info.note: The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
The evasion uses pseudo-random distribution .
One Heaven's Halberd grants a total of 400 health , 0.6 health regeneration and 25 (45 to strength heroes) attack damage .

cooldown.normal: Reduces the cooldown of active, passive and item abilities as well as the replenish time of charge-based abilities.

Cooldown Reduction.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

Spell Lifesteal.description: 25% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. Lifesteal reduced to 5% against creeps.

Octarine Core.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

additional_info.note: One Octarine Core grants a total of 425 health , 700 mana , 1 mana regeneration and 1.79% spell damage (and 25 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions created during Flutter still have evasion and not the movement speed bonus.

Flutter.description: Trades the 35% evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4 seconds.

Butterfly.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

additional_info.note: The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
The evasion uses pseudo-random distribution .
One Butterfly grants a total of 5 armor , 65 attack speed and 30 (65 to agility heroes) attack damage .

Chop Tree or Ward.description: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

Quell.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.

Quelling Blade.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

additional_info.note: Quelling Blade is usually purchased by melee carries who need to ensure that they can get last hits in lane.

Broadsword.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

Circlet.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

additional_info.note: One Circlet grants a total of 40 health , 0.12 health regeneration , 0.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 0.08 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage .

Overwhelm.description: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

Bash.description: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

Damage Block.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

Abyssal Blade.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

additional_info.note: When held by Slardar , Spirit Breaker , Troll Warlord or Faceless Void , Bash cannot proc.
One Abyssal Blade grants a total of 450 health , 15.6 health regeneration and 10 (20 to strength heroes) attack damage .

Chop Tree or Ward.description: Destroy a target tree or ward.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: The bonus damage is also affected by the illusions' attack damage penalty.

Quell.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 60% for melee heroes, and 25% for ranged.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Visual effects and sounds still play when illusions attack.

Cleave.description: Deals 40% of attack damage in a cone up to 570 around the target. (Melee Only)

Battle Fury.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

additional_info.note: Anti-Mage needs Battle Fury to farm, since he is terrible without items and has trouble farming fast without it. Combined with Blink , he can flash-farm the jungle and quickly build his much needed items if not ganked.

Mantle of Intelligence.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

additional_info.note: One Mantle of Intelligence grants a total of 33 mana , 0.12 mana regeneration and 0.21% spell damage (and 3 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Barrier.description: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

Hood of Defiance.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

additional_info.note: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance .
Increases most heroes' total magic resistance to 43.75%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
Increases Meepo 's and Visage 's total magic resistance to 51.25% and 32.5% respectively, assuming their basic magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Arctic Blast.description: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

Freezing Aura.description: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by 45.

Shiva's Guard.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

additional_info.note: One Shiva's Guard grants a total of 15 armor , 330 mana , 1.2 mana regeneration and 2.14% spell damage (and 30 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Plant.description: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 850 radius. Duration: 4 minutes. Does not grant ground vision. Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

True Sight.description: Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within the Sentry Ward's range.

Sentry Ward.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself and with Observer Wards in inventory.
Sentry Wards are completely shareable .

Lesser Corruption.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 2 for 8 seconds.

Blight Stone.lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

additional_info.note: Shadow Walk helps Bounty Hunter get close enough to debuff targets with Blight Stone, and increases the damage from Jinada . Support Bounty Hunters can also build it into a Medallion of Courage later.

Mini-Bash.description: Grants each attack a 35% chance to mini-stun and deal 160 bonus damage.

True Strike.description: Prevents your attacks from missing enemy units.

Monkey King Bar.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

additional_info.note: Monkey King Bar's True Strike works against every form of miss chance, not only evasion. This means it is also a viable pickup when the enemy has sources of blind .
The 35Â % chance to mini bash can cancel a channeling spell and also teleportation.

Ring of Protection.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

Transmute.description: Kills a non-hero target for 200 gold and 1.85x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Hand of Midas.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

additional_info.note: Carry heroes who need to farm for late game items often buy an early Hand of Midas.

modifiers.value: Dominated: Undispellable. Item Helm Of The Dominator Bonushealth: Undispellable.

Dominate.description: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

notes.note: Dominating a creep while already having one dominated causes the previous dominated creep to die.
The number of max allowed units is bound to the player. Buying a new Helm of the Dominator does not allow dominating an additional unit.

subnotes.note: This also goes for the Tempest Double ​'s copied Helm of the Dominator.
When a enemy steals the dominated creep (e.g. Enchant ​), dominating a new creep does not cause the previous one to die.
When the item gets sold or destroyed, the dominated creep dies.
The death is not credited to anyone so that no one gets experience from it.

notes.note: Sets the target's movement speed to 425, regardless of its default movement speed.
If the creep's maximum health is below 1400, its health is set to that value.
If its health is below the minimum base health, it gets fully healed as well. If it is equal or above, then it does not get healed.
Does not restore the creep's mana.
Cannot dominate Roshan , ancient creeps , Necronomicon summons and creep-heroes .

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Illusions do not benefit from the health regeneration bonus.

modifiers.value: Helm Of The Dominator Aura: Undispellable.

Dominator Aura.description: Increases health regen by 8 and attack speed by 10.

notes.note: The aura 's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Fully stacks with other sources of attack speed and health regeneration bonuses.
Regenerates up to 480 health in one minute.
Does not affect wards , buildings and invulnerable units.

Helm of the Dominator.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

additional_info.note: One Helm of the Dominator grants a total of 120 health , 8.18 health regeneration , 0.86 armor , 26 attack speed , 72 mana , 0.24 mana regeneration , 0.375% spell damage and 6 attack damage .

Enchanted Mango.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

additional_info.note: Enchanted Mangoes do not stack in the inventory. Each of them requires its own slot. Their regeneration does stack.
Enchanted Mangoes are not shareable , however, they can be cast on allies.
Enchanted Mangoes cannot be sold after the preparation phase.

Energy Charge.description: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 17 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

mana.normal: Can restore up to 255 health and mana when having the maximum amount of charges.

data.name: Health and Mana Restored per Charge

Magic Wand.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

additional_info.note: One Magic Wand grants a total of 80 health , 0.24 health regeneration , 0.57 armor , 4 attack speed , 44 mana , 0.16 mana regeneration , 0.29% spell damage and 4 attack damage .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on spell immune allies.
 Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies. Attempts to damage if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Soul Release.description: Heals 400 health over 8 seconds when cast on allies, and deals 150 pure damage over 8 seconds when cast on enemies. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Urn of Shadows.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

additional_info.note: One Urn of Shadows grants a total of 40 health , 0.12 health regeneration , 2.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 1.08 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage .
Unlike other combined items, Urn of Shadows cannot be disassembled within 10 seconds after assembling it.
Urn of Shadows cannot be built before the 3rd minute mark of a match, due to Infused Raindrop s not being available before then.
Can be created from an Infused Raindrop with only one charge left.

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on spell immune allies.
 Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies.

Shine.description: When cast on an ally, grants them 10 armor and 20% evasion. When cast on an enemy, removes 10 of their armor and grants your allies 35% Accuracy on the target. Removes the armor and evasion from the caster when used. Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Solar Crest.lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

additional_info.note: The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
The evasion uses pseudo-random distribution .
Solar Crest does not inherit the passive armor reduction from Blight Stone .

Salve.description: Restores 400 health to the target unit over 8 seconds. If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Healing Salve.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself in inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell-back price adapts based on the number of Salves in a stack.
Healing Salves are not shareable , however, they can be cast on allies.

Guard.description: For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +2 armor, and a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack. Units may only be affected by Guard once every 46 seconds.

Damage Block.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

Crimson Guard.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

additional_info.note: One Crimson Guard grants a total of 290 health , 8.12 health regeneration , 5.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 0.08 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Can proc on and attempts to damage spell immune enemies. Cannot bounce to spell immune enemies.

Chain Lightning.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.

notes.note: Does not stack with the Chain Lightning of Mjollnir or other Maelstroms.
When obtaining multiple items with the Chain Lightning ability, only the one that has been continuously the longest in the inventory works.
The lightning bounces in 0.25 second intervals, so hitting max targets takes 0.75 seconds.
Does not bounce on invisible units or units in the Fog of War .
Can never hit the same unit twice per proc.
Can only proc on successfully hit attacks, thus missed attacks cannot proc.
All bounces together can deal up to 480 damage ( before reductions ).
Chain Lightning can proc while a previous chain lightning is still bouncing.
Chain Lightning uses pseudo-random distribution .
The Maelstrom Chain buff is a hidden buff required for the lightning to jump.
Chain Lightning does not use a regular cooldown. It is neither displayed on the item icon when proccing, nor is it affected by cooldown manipulating effects.

Maelstrom.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

additional_info.note: Maelstrom is the most cost effective damage item for heroes with a low Base Attack Time .

Maelstrom is a very good item for speeding up farming. If the extra experience is not needed, it is good alternative to the Hand of Midas . Since the lightning has a huge bounce range, it can be used to damage multiple camps at once when farming in the woods, if vision over the camps is present.

It is also great to deal with illusions or mass-summons like Broodmother 's spiders, Nature's Prophet 's treants, etc, especially useful for ranged heroes that lack area damage, since they cannot make use of cleave .

The Chain Lightning deals magical , so it ignores armor and Damage Block , making it good against heroes that get a Vanguard , or Tidehunter with his Kraken Shell , and against heroes with high armor like Dragon Knight or Terrorblade .
To counter someone with a Maelstrom you can buy an Infused Raindrop , it will completely block Chain Lightnings.

Disguise.description: The user and all nearby allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius gain Deceit and 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.

Smoke of Deceit.lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

additional_info.note: Smoke of Deceit starts with a stock count of 3 and is limited to a count of 3.

subnotes.note: It takes 660 seconds for 1 smoke to replenish in the stock.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: All effects persist if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Ether Blast.description: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 3 seconds on enemies. Enemy targets are also slowed by 80%, and take 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.

Ethereal Blade.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

additional_info.note: One Ethereal Blade grants a total of 200 health , 0.6 health regeneration , 5.71 armor , 40 attack speed , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 10 (40 to agility heroes) attack damage .

Enlighten.description: Grants you 500 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team.

data.name: Bonus Experience Gained per Previous Tome

Tome of Knowledge.lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

additional_info.note: Becomes available for purchase at the 10 minute mark.
Tome of Knowledge is limited to a stock of 3 in the store. It takes 10 minutes for 1 tome to replenish in the stock.
Stacks with itself in inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell-back price adapts based on the number of Tomes in a stack.
Tomes of Knowledge are fully sharable .

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Basilius Aura.description: Grants 0.65 mana regeneration and 2 armor in a 900 radius. Deactivate aura to stop affecting non-hero units.

mana.normal: Restores mana in the form of mana regeneration, so it regenerates 0.065 mana in 0.1 second intervals, which is 0.65 mana per second.

Ring of Basilius.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

additional_info.note: Heroes with moderate mana concerns often buy a Ring of Basilius in the laning phase.

Pierce.description: Grants each attack a 25% chance to deal 85 bonus damage.

Javelin.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

Ring of Health.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling’s corpse.

additional_info.note: Heroes who need to farm continuously against lane harassment often purchase Ring of Health from the side shops.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions copy the Moon Shard buff. However, unlike the item itself, the buff does not grant them attack speed.

Consume.description: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 150 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

Moon Shard.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

additional_info.note: Multiple Moon Shards are not stacked in one inventory slot, each taking its own slot.

Cold Attack.description: Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

notes.note: Successive attacks with Eye of Skadi do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
Does not work against wards and buildings , but works against couriers and allied units.

Eye of Skadi.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

additional_info.note: Eye of Skadi does not inherit the damage over time from Orb of Venom .
One Eye of Skadi grants a total of 725 health , 0.75 health regeneration , 3.57 armor , 25 attack speed , 550 mana , 1 mana regeneration , 1.5625% spell damage and 25 attack damage .

Chop.description: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP. If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.

Quell.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.

Iron Talon.lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

additional_info.note: Heroes who intend to jungle or farm a little faster in lane will do well with Iron Talon.

Ultimate Orb.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

additional_info.note: One Ultimate Orb grants a total of 200 health , 0.6 health regeneration , 1.43 armor , 10 attack speed , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 10 attack damage .

Void Stone.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

additional_info.note: Void Stone is partially shareable .

Mystic Staff.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

additional_info.note: One Mystic Staff grants a total of 275 mana , 1 mana regeneration and 1.79% spell damage (and 25 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Mend.description: Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Guardian Aura.description: Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.

Guardian Greaves.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

One pair of Guardian Greaves grants a total of 100 health , 4.3 health regeneration , 7.71 armor , 5 attack speed , 305 mana , 0.2 mana regeneration , 0.36% spell damage and 5 attack damage . Together with the aura, it grants a total of 4.3 (15.3 while boosted) health regeneration and 7.71 (20.71 while boosted) armor to the owner.
Together with the aura, it grants a total of 4.3 (15.3 while boosted) health regeneration and 7.71 (20.71 while boosted) armor to the owner.

Mithril Hammer.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

additional_info.note: Mithril is a fictional metal from J.R.R. Tolkien's Lord of the Rings book trilogy, known for its strength and light weight. It has grown incredibly popular and is now used in a wide array of other fantasy universes, including the one Dota 2 takes place in.

Talisman of Evasion.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

additional_info.note: The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
The evasion uses pseudo-random distribution .

modifiers.value: Desolator Buff: Dispellable with any dispel.

Corruption.description: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

notes.note: Successive attacks with Desolator do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The target's armor is reduced before the attack damage is dealt, but still relies on the attack not to miss .
Works against every unit, including wards , buildings and allied units.
Replaces the projectile particle of ranged heroes with a red projectile.
Stacks with the Corruption debuff of Blight Stone (however, one hero cannot use both due to them being Unique Attack Modifiers ).

Desolator.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

additional_info.note: The Corruption debuff works against buildings , making it a great pushing tool. Split-pushing heroes can benefit a lot from it, allowing them to take towers down much quicker.
The Corruption debuff lasts quite long, so sometimes it is better to get the debuff on multiple enemies, instead of focusing only one target in team fights.
This item works well in combination with critical strike items and abilities, such as Mortal Strike â€‹ and Daedalus .

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Effects persist if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Hex.description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed. Instantly destroys illusions.

Scythe of Vyse.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

additional_info.note: One Scythe of Vyse grants a total of 200 health , 0.6 health regeneration , 1.43 armor , 10 attack speed , 385 mana , 1.4 (+ 150%) mana regeneration , 2.5% spell damage and 10 (35 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Energy Booster.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

Blink.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

Blink Dagger.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

additional_info.note: Initiating heroes with strong, large AoE disables rely heavily on Blink Dagger to take multiple enemies by surprise.

Plant Tree.description: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Iron Branch.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

additional_info.note: Iron Branches do not stack in the inventory.
One Iron Branch grants a total of 20 health , 0.06 health regeneration , 0.14 armor , 1 attack speed , 11 mana , 0.04 mana regeneration , 0.07% spell damage and 1 attack damage .

Teleport.description: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies. Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.

additional_info.note: Upgrading the item improves the Teleport ability. Can be upgraded only once.
The total gold cost for each level is 2400/4400.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Effect persists and attempts to deal damage when expiring while spell immune if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Soul Rend.description: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magic damage. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 40% more damage.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Red critical numbers are before illusion and armor reduction.

Critical Strike.description: Grants a 20% chance for attacks to inflict 75% more damage.

Bloodthorn.lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

additional_info.note: One Bloodthorn grants a total of 30 attack speed , 275 mana , 1 (+150%) mana regeneration , 1.79% spell damage and 60 (85 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Yasha.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Yasha-based items (Yasha, Sange and Yasha , Manta Style ) do not stack.
One Yasha grants a total of 2.29 armor and 31 attack speed (and 16 attack damage to agility heroes).

Reset Cooldowns.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

Refresher Orb.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

additional_info.note: Tidehunter may pick Refresher Orb because of his long-cooldown ultimate, Ravage , dealing high damage to all enemies in an area, and a high perma-stun. Keep an eye on his low mana-pool before using double Ravage!

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

modifiers.value: Sange Buff: Dispellable with any dispel.

Lesser Maim.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

notes.note: Successive procs on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The proc chances of Lesser Maim from multiple Sange work fully independently from each other.
Fully stacks with the Lesser Maim from Heaven's Halberd and the Greater Maim from Sange and Yasha , including the slow .
Does not work against wards and buildings . Works against allied units.
Lesser Maim uses pseudo-random distribution .

Sange.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

additional_info.note: One Sange grants a total of 320 health , 0.48 health regeneration and 10 (26 to strength heroes) attack damage .

Deploy Courier.description: Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

Go To Secret Shop.description: Sends the courier to your team's secret shop.

Animal Courier.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

additional_info.note: Animal Courier is completely shareable .
Animal Courier has a 2 minutes stock cooldown.
Animal Courier can be upgraded to a Flying Courier .

Endurance.description: Gives +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.

Swiftness Aura.description: Gives 20 movement speed to nearby allies.

Drum of Endurance.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

additional_info.note: The item does not disappear upon using up all charges.
The charges can be replenished by purchasing the recipe again.

One Drum of Endurance grants a total of 20 movement speed , 120 health , 0.36 health regeneration , 0.43 armor , 3 attack speed , 66 mana , 0.24 (+50%) mana regeneration , 0.43% spell damage and 9 (6 to agility heroes) attack damage . Together with the active ability, it grants a total of 28 attack speed to the owner.
Together with the active ability, it grants a total of 28 attack speed to the owner.

Aethereal Focus.description: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 220.

Aether Lens.lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

additional_info.note: The spell damage bonuses from multiple Aether Lenses stack.
The spell damage bonus from Aether Lens (6%) is equivalent to the amount provided by 84 intelligence .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on self while spell immune.
 Cannot be cast on other spell immune units.

Force.description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

Force Staff.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

additional_info.note: One Force Staff grants a total of 6 health regeneration , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.71% spell damage (and 10 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Gloves of Haste.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

additional_info.note: Jungling heroes who intend to build a Hand of Midas will sometimes purchase Gloves of Haste in the early game.

Demon Edge.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

modifiers.value: Sange And Yasha Buff: Dispellable with any dispel.

Greater Maim.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

notes.note: Successive procs on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The proc chances of Greater Maim from multiple Sange and Yasha work fully independently from each other.
Fully stacks with the Lesser Maim from Sange and from Heaven's Halberd , including the slow .
Does not work against wards and buildings . Works against allied units.
Greater Maim uses pseudo-random distribution .

Sange and Yasha.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Yasha-based items ( Yasha , Sange and Yasha, Manta Style ) do not stack.
One Sange and Yasha grants a total of 320 health , 0.48 health regeneration , 2.29 armor , 32 attack speed and 32 (16 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Poison Attack.description: Poisons the target, dealing 5 damage per second for 3 seconds and slowing movement 12% if the equipped hero is melee, or 4% if they are ranged.

Orb of Venom.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

additional_info.note: Orb of Venom is generally picked up by melee heroes who intend to harass in lane.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_PARTIAL_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Vladmir's Aura.description: Grants lifesteal (15% for melee heroes, 10% for ranged), 3 health regeneration, 0.8 mana regeneration, 15% bonus attack damage, and 4 armor to nearby allies.

mana.normal: Restores health and mana in the form of health and mana regeneration, so it regenerates 0.3 health and 0.08 mana in 0.1 second intervals, which is 3 health and 0.8 mana per second.

Vladmir's Offering.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

additional_info.note: One Vladmir's Offering grants a total of 40 health , 3.12 health regeneration , 4.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 0.88 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 (+ 15%) attack damage .

Mirror Image.description: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.

Manta Style.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Yasha-based items ( Yasha , Sange and Yasha , Manta Style) do not stack.

One Manta Style grants a total of 10% movement speed , 200}} health , 0.6 health regeneration , 3.71 armor , 41 attack speed , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 10 (26 to agility heroes) attack damage .

Regenerate.description: Consumes a charge to restore 90 health and 60 mana over 2.5 seconds. Healing stops if attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain.

Store Rune.description: Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes.

Bottle.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

additional_info.note: Bottles are fully sharable .

subnotes.note: However, a Bottle which currently contains a rune cannot be shared, dropped or moved into the backpack.

Assault Aura.description: Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by 5.

Assault Cuirass.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

additional_info.note: Together with the aura, one Assault Cuirass grants a total of 15 armor and 55 attack speed to the owner.

Sacrifice.description: Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds. If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

mana.normal: Only counts actual spent mana. Mana lost in other ways

Soul Ring.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

additional_info.note: If Alchemist is facing a hard lane, he can use Soul Ring to get last hits by using Acid Spray repeatedly.

Quarterstaff.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

Fade.description: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as target unit remains still. Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Shadow Amulet.lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

additional_info.note: Fading into invisibility
Fully invisible

Sage's Mask.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

additional_info.note: Sage's Mask is partially shareable .

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Aquila Aura.description: Grants 0.65 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies. Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.

mana.normal: Restores mana in the form of mana regeneration, so it regenerates 0.065 mana in 0.1 second intervals, which is 0.65 mana per second.

Ring of Aquila.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

additional_info.note: One Ring of Aquila grants a total of 60 health , 0.18 health regeneration , 3.29 armor , 9 attack speed , 33 mana , 0.77 mana regeneration , 0.21% spell damage and 13 (19 to agility heroes) attack damage .

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Effect persists and attempts to deal damage when expiring while spell immune if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Soul Burn.description: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Orchid Malevolence.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

additional_info.note: One Orchid Malevolence grants a total of 30 attack speed , 275 mana , 1 (+ 150%) mana regeneration , 1.79% spell damage and 30 (55 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Glimmer.description: After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channelling.

Glimmer Cape.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

additional_info.note: The magic resistance stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Increases most heroes' total magic resistance to 36.25%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance. Together with the active, this is further increased to 64.94%.
Together with the active, this is further increased to 64.94%.

Increases Meepo 's and Visage 's total magic resistance to 44.75% and 23.5% respectively, assuming their basic magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance. Together with the active, this is further increased to 69.61% and 57.93%.
Together with the active, this is further increased to 69.61% and 57.93%.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE:
Gets disabled for illusions upon taking damage.
 Illusions do not benefit from the health regen.

Health Regeneration.description: Restores 7% of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.

Heart of Tarrasque.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

additional_info.note: One Heart of Tarrasque grants a total of 1300 health and 2.4 (+ 7% of max health) health regeneration (and 40 attack damage to strength heroes).

Helm of Iron Will.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

Energy Burst.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Dagon.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

additional_info.note: Upgrading the item improves its stats and the damage, range and cooldown of Energy Burst . Can be upgraded four times.
The total gold cost for each level is 2720/3970/5220/6470/7720.

One Dagon grants 60 health , 0.18 health regeneration , 0.43 armor , 3 attack speed , 176/209/242/275/308 mana , 0.64/0.76/0.88/1/1.12 mana regeneration , 1.14%/1.36%/1.57%/1.79%/2% spell damage and 12 (25/28/31/34/37 to intelligence heroes) attack damage on each level.

Replenish Mana.description: Restores 135 mana to all nearby allies.

Arcane Boots.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

Slippers of Agility.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

additional_info.note: One Slippers of Agility grants a total of 0.43 armor and 3 attack speed (and 3 attack damage to agility heroes).

Null Talisman.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

additional_info.note: One Null Talisman grants a total of 60 health , 0.18 health regeneration , 0.43 armor , 3 attack speed , 66 mana , 0.24 mana regeneration , 0.43% spell damage and 6 (9 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Belt of Strength.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

additional_info.note: One Belt of Strength grants a total of 120 health and 0.36 health regeneration (and 6 attack damage to strength heroes).

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Can be cast while spell immune. However, the buff gets immediately removed if spell immunity is detected.

Ghost Form.description: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

Ghost Scepter.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

additional_info.note: One Ghost Scepter grants a total of 100 health , 0.3 health regeneration , 0.71 armor , 5 attack speed , 55 mana , 0.2 mana regeneration , 0.36% spell damage and 5 attack damage .

Faerie Fire.lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

additional_info.note: Faerie Fire does not stack in the inventory. Each of them requires its own slot. Their attack damage bonus does stack.
Faerie Fire is not shareable and cannot be used on allies.

modifiers.value: Item Satanic Unholy: Dispellable with any dispel.

Unholy Rage.description: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.

notes.note: Interrupts the owner's channeling spells upon cast.
Directly increases the lifesteal granted by its passive part by 175%, resulting in 200% lifesteal.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Lifesteal particles are visible on illusions, but they do not gain health from their attacks.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

notes.note: The lifesteal stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal which are not Unique Attack Modifiers .
Cannot lifesteal off of wards , buildings or allied units.

Satanic.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

additional_info.note: One Satanic grants a total of 500 health , 0.75 health regeneration and 50 (75 to strength heroes) attack damage .

special_details.PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Silence and armor reduction persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

modifiers.value: Item Mask Of Madness Berserk: Dispellable with any dispel.

Berserk.description: Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 5 and silences you. Lasts 8 seconds.

notes.note: Does not interrupt the owner's channeling spells upon cast.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Lifesteal particles are visible on illusions, but they do not gain health from their attacks.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

notes.note: The lifesteal stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal which are not Unique Attack Modifiers .
Cannot lifesteal off of wards , buildings and allied units. Can lifesteal off of siege creeps .

Mask of Madness.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

additional_info.note: After using Storm Hammer ​, Warcry ​, and God's Strength ​, Sven has very high armor and does not need to cast more spells, allowing him to kill enemies easily with high damage and attack speed.

Band of Elvenskin.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

additional_info.note: One Band of Elvenskin grants a total of 0.86 armor and 6 attack speed (and 6 attack damage to agility heroes).

special_details.BLOCKED_BY_LINKEN: Still loses a charge when blocked.

modifiers.value: Item Diffusal Blade Slow: Dispellable with any dispel. Rooted: Dispellable with any dispel.

Purge.description: Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for 4 seconds.

notes.note: Applies a basic dispel on the target upon cast.
The dispel is applied first, followed by the slow .
Can be cast on invulnerable units.
The slow decreases in 0.8 second intervals, so it slows for 100%/80%/60%/40%/20%, going one step down every 0.8 seconds.
When cast on non-hero units, it roots the target for the initial 3 seconds, preventing it from moving and casting certain mobility spells.

subnotes.note: The slow is still applied to the target, so that it still is slowed for the remaining duration once the root wears off.
Does not interrupt the target's channeling spells.
Does not provide True Sight over the target.

notes.note: Treats Roshan , ancient creeps and creep-heroes as heroes.

special_details.NOT_UNIQUE_ATTACK_MODIFIER: Does not stack with other Mana Break abilities.
special_details.ILLUSIONS_PARTIAL_USE: Mana burned and damage dealt is reduced for illusions.

Manabreak.description: Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

notes.note: The damage is directly added to the owner's attack damage.
The owner can lifesteal off the damage dealt by Manabreak. However, it cannot crit or cleave .
The damage can be reduced with e.g. Enfeeble ​ or Static Link ​.

subnotes.note: However, it cannot be amplified with e.g. Empower â€‹ or the Double Damage Rune .

notes.note: Does not work against allied units when attacking them.
Applies the mana loss first, and then the damage.
Effectively increases a hero's attack damage by 40 against units which have enough mana to burn.

Diffusal Blade.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

additional_info.note: The item does not disappear upon using up all charges.
Upgrading the item improves its stats and refreshes the charge counter back to 8. Can be upgraded only once.
The total gold cost for each level is 3150/3850.

One Diffusal Blade grants the following on each level: Level 1: 3.57 armor , 25 attack speed , 120 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.625% spell damage (and 25 attack damage to agility heroes, or 10 attack damage to intelligence heroes). Level 2: 5 armor, 35 attack speed, 180 mana, 0.6 mana regeneration and 0.9375% spell damage (and 35 attack damage to agility heroes, or 15 attack damage to intelligence heroes).
Level 1: 3.57 armor , 25 attack speed , 120 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.625% spell damage (and 25 attack damage to agility heroes, or 10 attack damage to intelligence heroes).
Level 2: 5 armor, 35 attack speed, 180 mana, 0.6 mana regeneration and 0.9375% spell damage (and 35 attack damage to agility heroes, or 15 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Echo Shell.description: Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

Lotus Orb.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

Wind Lace.lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

Blade of Alacrity.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

additional_info.note: One Blade of Alacrity grants a total of 1.43 armor and 10 attack speed (and 10 attack damage to agility heroes).

Staff of Wizardry.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

additional_info.note: One Staff of Wizardry grants a total of 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.71% spell damage (and 10 attack damage to intelligence heroes).

Eaglesong.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

additional_info.note: One Eaglesong grants a total of 3.57 armor and 25 attack speed (and 25 attack damage to agility heroes).

Divine Rapier.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

additional_info.note: This item drops when its wielder dies, unless it has Reincarnation .
Divine Rapier cannot be destroyed or sold.
Unlike other combined items, Divine Rapier cannot be disassembled within 10 seconds after assembling it.
Couriers can be used to buy a Divine Rapier, but they cannot pick rapiers up from the ground.
Divine Rapier has two states: Original Rapier : initial state upon buying the item Free Rapier : state after being picked up by an enemy once
Original Rapier : initial state upon buying the item
Free Rapier : state after being picked up by an enemy once

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Red critical numbers are before illusion and armor reduction.

Critical Strike.description: Grants each attack a 20% chance to deal 75% additional damage.

Crystalys.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

additional_info.note: Before 5.40 , Crystalys was named " Crystal Battlegear " and before 5.31 , it was named " Crystal Defender ".

Wraith Band.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

additional_info.note: One Wraith Band grants a total of 60 health , 0.18 health regeneration , 0.86 armor , 6 attack speed , 33 mana , 0.12 mana regeneration , 0.21% spell damage and 6 (9 to agility heroes) attack damage .

Armor Bonus.description: Gives +2 armor to all allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

Buckler.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

additional_info.note: One Buckler grants a total of 40 health , 0.12 health regeneration , 5.29 armor , 2 attack speed , 22 mana , 0.08 mana regeneration , 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage .

Damage Block.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

Vanguard.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

additional_info.note: Grants a large amount of health and protection from attacks, works well with blink.

Shadow Walk.description: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack.

Shadow Blade.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

additional_info.note: Shadow Blade is very useful for Monkey King to gank with 4 charges of Jingu Mastery, as the damage stacks with Shadow Walk's backstab damage.

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on spell immune allies.
 Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies.

Valor.description: If cast on an ally, grants them the 7 armor, and removing it from the caster. If cast on an enemy, reduces 7 armor on both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Medallion of Courage.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

additional_info.note: Medallion of Courage does not inherit the passive armor reduction from Blight Stone .

special_details.PARTIAL_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE:
Can be cast on self while spell immune.
 Cannot be cast on other spell immune units.

Hurricane Thrust.description: Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Dragon's Reach.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

Hurricane Pike.lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

additional_info.note: One Hurricane Pike grants a total of 300 health , 6.9 health regeneration , 2.86 armor , 20 attack speed , 110 mana , 0.4 mana regeneration , 0.71% spell damage and 15 attack damage to strength heroes, 20 attack damage to agility heroes, or 10 attack damage to intelligence heroes.
The attack range bonus works for ranged heroes only.
Attack range bonuses from multiple Dragon Lance based items do not stack.
Stacks with all other attack range bonuses.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.

Teleport.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself in the inventory.
Town Portal Scroll is completely shareable .

Magic Weakness.description: Cast a 600 radius blast that decreases enemy magic resistance by 25%.

additional_info.note: One Veil of Discord grants a total of 120 health , 6.36 health regeneration , 6.86 armor , 6 attack speed , 132 mana , 0.48 mana regeneration , 0.86% spell damage and 12 (18 to intelligence heroes) attack damage .

Plant.description: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Observer Ward.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

additional_info.note: Observer Wards start with a stock count of 2 and are limited to a count of 4.

subnotes.note: It takes 150 seconds for 1 ward to replenish in the stock.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Lifesteal particles are visible on illusions, but they do not gain health from their attacks.

Lifesteal.description: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt. Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier , and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Morbid Mask.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

additional_info.note: Lifesteal makes Troll Warlord much tougher in fights, and allows him to farm uninterrupted throughout the early to mid game.

Restore.description: Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CANNOT_USE: Illusions provide the aura, but do not benefit from it.

Mekansm Aura.description: Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.

Mekansm.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

additional_info.note: One Mekansm grants a total of 100 health , 4.3 health regeneration , 5.71 armor , 5 attack speed , 55 mana , 0.2 mana regeneration , 0.36% spell damage and 5 attack damage .

Energy Charge.description: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

mana.normal: Can restore up to 150 health and mana when having the maximum amount of charges.

data.name: Health and Mana Restored per Charge

Magic Stick.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

additional_info.note: Fragile support heroes often purchase a Magic Stick in the early game as a means to save themselves during ganks, or gain enough mana to use one last ability.

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Blinds and attempts to damage if debuff was placed before spell immunity.
special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE:
Illusions deal less damage with Burn around them.
 The main hero's Burn always takes priority, if an enemy is within range of both the hero and its illusion.

Burn.description: When active, scorches enemies for 60 damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks.

Radiance.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

additional_info.note: Radiance is most commonly purchased on Heroes who rely on long-lived illusions to farm and fight, either from an innate spell or in combination with Manta Style .

Damage Block.description: Grants a 100% chance for melee heroes to block 20 damage from enemy heroes. Blocks 10 damage on ranged heroes. Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

Poor Man's Shield.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

additional_info.note: One Poor Man's Shield grants a total of 0.86 armor and 6 attack speed (and 6 attack damage to agility heroes).

Demonic Summoning.description: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 50 seconds. Warrior: Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3. Archer: Has an activated mana burn ability, and a passive movement and attack speed aura.

Mana Break.description: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.

Last Will.description: Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.

Mana Burn.description: Launches an arrow that burns away the targeted unit's mana, dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.

special_details.ILLUSIONS_CAN_USE: Illusions benefit from the movement and attack speed bonuses.

Archer Aura.description: Increases movement and attack speed of nearby units.

Necronomicon.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

additional_info.note: Upgrading the item improves its stats and strengthens the summons from Demonic Summoning . Can be upgraded twice.
The total gold cost for each level is 2650/3850/5050.

One Necronomicon grants 160/240/320 health , 0.48/0.72/0.96 health regeneration , 165/231/264 mana , 0.6/0.84/0.96 mana regeneration and 1.07%/1.5%/1.71% spell damage (and 8/12/16 attack damage to strength heroes, or 15/21/24 attack damage to intelligence heroes) on each level.

Sacred Relic.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

additional_info.note: When having a Demon Edge and a Radiance recipe in the inventory, buying Sacred Relic results in a finished Radiance , and not a Divine Rapier .

Switch Attribute.description: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

Power Treads.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

additional_info.note: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
Attack speed bonuses of multiple Power Treads do not stack.
There are three ways to assemble Power Treads. Based on which item is chosen, the boot's initial status is different. The status can be switched freely after purchase.
Disassembling Power Treads returns the items which were originally used to build it. It is not based on the currently selected attribute.
One pair of Power Treads grants a total of:

special_details.NO_PIERCE_SPELL_IMMUNE: Root persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

Rod of Atos.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

additional_info.note: One Rod of Atos grants a total of 300 health , 0.9 health regeneration , 0.86 armor , 6 attack speed , 220 mana , 0.8 mana regeneration , 1.43% spell damage and 21 attack damage to strength heroes, 12 attack damage to agility heroes, or 26 attack damage to intelligence heroes.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.

Replenish.description: Restores 190 mana to the target unit over 50 seconds. If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

mana.normal: Restores mana in the form of mana regeneration, so it restores 0.38 mana in 0.1 second intervals, which is 3.8 mana per second.

Clarity.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

additional_info.note: Stacks with itself in inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell-back price adapts based on the number of Clarities in a stack.
Clarities are not shareable , however, they can be cast on allies.

Pocket Deny.description: Instantly causes you to die. Must ground target to cast. Cannot self cast.

Bloodpact.description: Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1600 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all nearby allies, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.

data.name: Charge Gain per Enemy Hero Death
Death Bonus Area Heal per Charge

Bloodstone.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

additional_info.note: Bloodstone cannot be put into the backpack .

Hyperstone.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

additional_info.note: Hyperstone is featured in the Dota 2 Gamescom trailer as an item for "swift" heroes that gives you "speed beyond measure".
